TransCent

A platform to streamline transplant-related research at the KU Leuven.

Transcending transplantation limits.

Mission statement

A dynamic team of researchers and clinicians

Improving the health and life of transplant recipients.​

...

About

When life-sustaining organs irreversibly fail, organ transplantation can be a live saving treatment.​

Research

Transplantation-related research is necessary to increase the quality and number of donor organs.​

Organigram

We are a dynamic team of researchers and clinicians from different medical and scientific backgrounds.
